name: TypeScript
description: TypeScript is a programming language developed and maintained by Microsoft. It is a strict syntactical superset of JavaScript and adds optional static typing to the language. TypeScript is designed for the development of large applications and transcompiles to JavaScript.

name: MS Teams
description: Microsoft Teams is a proprietary business communication platform developed by Microsoft
column6: as part of the Microsoft 365 family of products. Teams primarily competes with the similar service Slack

description: Based on SAFe our Agile Scrum Methodology is a knowledge base of tested and integrated principles

name: Strong Security Policy
description: We meet the the security requirements set out by the Global Information Security Policies enforcing management directions and support for information security in accordance with business requirements and relevant laws and regulations.

name: PEGA
description: Pegasystems Inc. is an American software company based in Cambridge

name: Microsoft Visual Studio
description: Microsoft Visual Studio is an integrated development environment (IDE) from Microsoft. It is used to develop computer programs
